mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNABOARD ORDER BY QNUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNABOARD(QNUM, QID, QSUBJECT, QCONTENT, QREGDATE, QREPLY) VALUES(QNASEQ.NEXTVAL, #{QID}, #{QSUBJECT}, #{QCONTENT}, SYSDATE, #{QREPLY})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNABOARD SET QID = #{QID}, QSUBJECT= #{QSUBJECT}, QCONTENT = #{QCONTENT} WHERE QNUM = #{QNUM}
